data.title: What's this supposed to mean?
data.statement:
As a Codingamer, you enjoy working on the puzzles, CoC's and games. One day, you notice a new notification... and find that someone has commented on your contribution. As you read the message, your satisfaction dwindles as your confusion grows. What's this supposed to mean?

You get messages from some guy named Cody. These messages look like complete gibberish. But there must be some reason for getting these messages. You decide to make a program that will find the meaning in the complex message [[msg]] that you've received.

(If you're stuck, you can find a {{hint}} in <<TEST #3>>)

testCases.title: How do I solve this?
testCases.testIn: H9E0RE'S A4 HI6NT 3TO S2O4LVE Tti1S4 PRO4BL1EM. AL[]L [LOWERCASE] LETTERS [A]RE .T;H.E' ME'S;S'AG]E AND '_' /ARE. THE. SP.ACES. N0/W/JU5T /R3VER[5]E TH{0}5E [CH4RAC{T3R}S.

testCases.title: Risk isn't a board game... is it?
Eureka! I got it.
testCases.testIn: NICELY DONE CODER! HERE'S YOUR USERNAME: 'e[of334]_yht@`#13[row]_[a#3]_de2vo-+3rp_1#u[oy]3$#'5

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testOut: THESE REALLY CAN BE A MIND PUZZLE

data.constraints:
20 < length of [[msg]] < 170
[[msg]] only contains ASCII characters
data.stubGenerator:
read msg:string(200)

write A message inside a message.
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1>> : A string [[msg]] that is the cryptic message.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1>> : The hidden meaning or message inside [[msg]].

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

As a Codingamer, you enjoy working on the puzzles, CoC's and games. One day, you notice a new notification... and find that someone has commented on your contribution. As you read the message, your satisfaction dwindles as your confusion grows. What's this supposed to mean?

You get messages from some guy named Cody. These messages look like complete gibberish. But there must be some reason for getting these messages. You decide to make a program that will find the meaning in the complex message msg that you've received.

(If you're stuck, you can find a hint in TEST #3)
Input
Line 1 : A string msg that is the cryptic message.
Output
Line 1 : The hidden meaning or message inside msg.
Constraints
20 < length of msg < 170
msg only contains ASCII characters
Example
Input
d./;OG]l/A]DY/T]IGErBU[GCoW;wOL'F_oC.E[LOT-LlA'MA'lIO/NeL'E[PHA5NT7hO4G
Output
HELLO WORLD
